chapter.para: You can use &MESH; with applications that you deploy to &ECS;, Kubernetes (that you deploy to your own &EC2; instances or running on &EKS;), and &EC2;. To get started with &MESH;, select one of the services that you have applications deployed to that you want to use with &MESH;. You can always enable applications in the other services to also work with &MESH; after you complete one of the Getting started guides.
